## Commands

### Create Index
    bwa index reference/kiv2_6.fasta 
    
### Align Reads
    bwa mem reference/kiv2_6.fasta alignment/students-data/students/LPA-Plasmid-long-50-1-LongAmp-NEB_S78_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz alignment/students-data/students/LPA-Plasmid-long-50-1-LongAmp-NEB_S78_L001_R2_001.fastq.gz | gzip -3 > aln-pe.sam.gz

### Conver and Sort
    samtools view -Sb aln-pe.sam.gz > kiv2.bam
    samtools sort kiv2.bam > kiv2_sorted.bam
    
### Variant Calling    
    /opt/tools/freebayes/bin/freebayes --fasta-reference reference/kiv2_6.fasta kiv2_sorted.bam > kiv2_variants.vcf
